com.captcha.botdetect.web.servlet
Class Captcha

java.lang.Object
  com.captcha.botdetect.web.servlet.Captcha

public class Captcha
extends java.lang.Object

This class builds upon the general Captcha functionality in CaptchaBase, and abstracts functionality common to different possible kinds of Captcha controls.
